alert.note: Alert for Baker; Calhoun; Early (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 04 at 5:44AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Baker, southeastern Calhoun and east central Early Counties in southwestern Georgia through 615 AM EST... At 544 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Blakely, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Arlington, Leary, Douglasville, Damascus, Iveys Mill, Milford, Crestview, Cuba, Hawkinstown, Mimsville, Bermuda, Old Damascus, Elmodel Wma, Bethany, Hentown, Patmos and Rowena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
